wikipedia_page.main: Sir Sigismund Ferdinand Mendl  (2 December 1866 – 17 July 1945) was a British Liberal Party politician and businessman.

link_mentions.page: List of MPs elected in the 1895 United Kingdom general election
response: *12 January: Plymouth - Sigismund Mendl, Liberal, replacing

link_mentions.page: List of British Jewish nobility and gentry

response: Mendl was born in London in 1871, the second son of Ferdinand Mendl and Jeanette Rachel; their firstborn son was Sigismund Mendl. He was educated at Harrow School, after which he started a branch of his father's grain importing business in Buenos Aires.
